title: Expanding math skills with the mini-calculator: problem solving
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Aesop Films, James M. Smith and Susan Norton
brief_description: Presents a variety of classroom situations in which teachers use calculators to help students comprehend mathematical relationships. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
